body.name: Cuisinart 10-Inch Open Skillet, Chef's Classic Stainless Steel Cookware Collection, 722-24
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 51 mins
features: EXCEPTIONAL DESIGN: enjoy mirror finish, classic look and professional performance. Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly– eliminating hot spots
PREMIUM COOKING: stainless steel cooking surface does not discolor, react with food or alter flavors. Measurement markings for ease of use, drip free pouring, and flavor lock lid
EXCEPTIONAL HANDLING: cool grip handles are solid stainless steel riveted handles that stay cool on the stove top and provide a safe a solid grip
CLEAN UP: dishwasher safe for an easy clean up
LIFETIME WARRANTY: Refer to user manual for troubleshooting steps and questions surrounding warranty policies – this product is BPA free
body.description: Product Description The kitchens of France were the inspiration behind the elegant Cuisinart Chef's Classic Stainless Cookware Collection. Our 10" Skillet is induction ready and features stainless steel and pure aluminum encapsulated in the base for fast and even heating. Features: Induction-ready|Mirror finish. Classic looks professional performance.|Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly. Eliminates hot spots. Amazon.com Sauté mushrooms or brown sausages to perfection in this classic 10-inch Cuisinart skillet--the sloped sides are ideal for tossing and turning small pieces of food. Made of professional quality 18/10 stainless steel that wont react with acidic foods, the skillet features a tapered rim for drip-free pouring and a riveted, cast stainless-steel handle thats contoured for an easy grip. The skillets mirror finish retains its brightness through dishwasher, freezer, broiler, and oven use up to 550 degrees Fahrenheit. For superior, even heating, an aluminum disk is encapsulated between two layers of stainless steel in the base. Cuisinart covers the skillet with a lifetime warranty.--Ann Bieri

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It cooks evenly. The handle stays cool. It cleans beautifully both by hand and in the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice pan
reviews.reviewText: Came in good condition. Nice to use. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great frying pan!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little frying pan. The key to make it not stick (for things like frying eggs) is to heat it up until when you drop water on it, the water drop bounces around rather than evaporating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just 1 flaw, otherwise perfect
reviews.reviewText: This pan has 1 shortcoming, otherwise it performs perfectly fine for the price. If you cook on an electric surface where the heated area covers the bottom of the perfectly (no more no less) the heat does not reach the sidewalls adequately in my opinion. If you are cooking ground meats, piece of chicken or eggs you only need low heat then the heat will not transfer to the walls of the pan. I dont like this. I think with a gas stove or an electric circle just a half inch past the bottom of the pan would fix this problem. But if you are using a circle of heat that fits the bottom exactly, heat does not transfer properly to the walls in my opinion. Not a deal breaker but something to adapt to with the pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan, it is not non-stick coated which great. I use a little water rather than oil. Heats up quick, handle never gets even warm, good size and depth. Do not overheat since it will burn, keeping the correct heat will make it non-stick. I clean with Scotch Brite - do not use harsh ajax/gritty things. Cleans up perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good heat distribution; cooks well, cleans surprisingly easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, like the long handle, cooks evenly. Really glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The wife likes it and it does seem to be made of good quality. Heats well and should last a long time, as we had one before that lasted over 10 years.
Excelente producto, excelente precio.Solo deberian cuidar mas el empaque en las orillas, ya que el mio traia un ligero golpe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great little skillet. Wanted one that I could put in a hot oven. This is perfect if a little difficult to clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena sartén, recomendable usar fuego medio
reviews.reviewText: Es una sartén bien construida y bonita. Es necesario aprender a utilizarla y una vez que lo sabes es una maravilla cocinar en ella. Es muy versátil y si algo se llega a pegar la puedes dejar en remojo y se quita fácilmente. No le doy 5 estrellas porque me parece que es más delicada que otras sartenes de acero inoxidable que he tenido, veo que se maltrata un poco más y más rápido que otras. No se te ocurra utilizar fuego muy alto porque se llega a quemar fácilmente, cómo cualquier sartén de acero.

Lo compré para regalo, al principio no estuvo bien, pero después no se q haría la persona y ahora está encantada con el sarténMe gustaría pusieran recomendaciones para su usoPorque pienso hacer más pedidos,
